text: Boh ka jeut Lon bri Neukheun le Allah Lon peutron idang teuma keu gata Teuma di gata bek le buet salah Meu soe nyang kaphe lam kawan gata â€˜Oh lheuh keu gata Lon bri maidah Meuhat Lon azeub nyang that sengsara Nyang han tom nyang ka beu brat sileupah Hana meusidroe nyang lagee gata Nyang that Lon siksa sidumnan salah
